column2: Social Media at Kesko - K-Group | K Brand

column1: My social media career has been built step by step. Consciously and un-consciously.
📌 FIRST STEP: Social media listening and customer service

My social media comms pro -career started in summer 2014. I was on my summer holiday when I received a call from work and got an interview to work as ""Communications Officer"". Those were times. Big things were coming up (or as we here in Finland say ""Isoi juttui tulos!"").

So my first step on social media was all about social listening. I was moderating Finnish social media. It really taught me comms and how people interact on social media. Everyone should do a few months customer service on social media. It really teaches to find inner peace and grows your patience. Okay
📌 SECOND STEP: Social media content producing and coaching
📌 THIRD STEP: Social media content producing
column3: coaching and strategy work (I knew a sh*t about good strategy work then tbh)

column1: Second and third steps were tougher. Lots of content producing and coaching. One could say that it was my ""learning phase"" to become social media comms pro. Social media was changing a lot back then so maybe it was understandable. Snapchat
column2: Facebook Live and Instagram Stories were rolling out. Big changes.

column1: 📌 FIFTH AND CURRENT STEP: Everything you read above and little bit more.

Fourth step was a bigger one. I was head of Social media at LähiTapiola. Fifth and current step are quite similar. Altough I'm quite experienced now compared to 2017 when I started at LähiTapiola. Current position at Kesko - K-Group combines different tasks from the past and brings something new (example web site development).
Now I'm enjoying my work life at Kesko - K-Group: making better processes
column2: social media strategy work and creating exciting content on social media. There are lot to do but I'm very excited about the future.";[];[('Social Media Specialist'
